channel.title: Item on item
channel.description: Well, is it possible that when you use ONE item on ONE item, THREE items of your inventory will go, but that if u don't have that three, u can't make it.

item.title: Item on item
item.dc:creator: @sexy_slay sexy slay
item.description:
@sexy_slay wrote:

[quote=“SirPali, post:7, topic:332335”]In client.java, in case 53 (item on item) add this under

if (!playerHasItem(itemUsed) || !playerHasItem(useWith)) { break; }

else if((itemUsed == flourID) && (useWith == tinID) || (itemUsed == eggid) && (useWith == tinID) || (itemUsed == milkID) && (useWith == tinID)) { if(playerHasItem(milkID) && playerHasItem(eggID) && playerHasItem(flourID)){ deleteItem(flourID, getItemSlot(flourID), 1); deleteItem(eggID, getItemSlot(eggID), 1); deleteItem(milkID, getItemSlot(milkID), 1); addItem(unbakedPie, 1); }else{ sM("You do not have the required ingredients."); } }

Cba to find the correct ID’s, so you’ll have to do that yourself.[/quote]

Use this code (one i fixed above) only if your using Delta Source!

Read full topic

item.title: Item on item
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

In client.java, in case 53 (item on item) add this under

if (!playerHasItem(itemUsed) || !playerHasItem(useWith)) { break; }

else if((itemUsed == flourID) && (useWith == tinID) || (itemUsed == eggid) && (useWith == tinID) || (itemUsed == milkID) && (useWith == tinID)) { if(playerHasItem(milkID) && playerHasItem(eggID) && playerHasItem(flourID)){ deleteItem(flourID, getItemSlot(flourID), 1); deleteItem(eggID, getItemSlot(eggID), 1); deleteItem(milkID, getItemSlot(milkID), 1); addItem(unbakedPie, 1); }else{ sendMessage("You do not have the required ingredients."); } }

Cba to find the correct ID’s, so you’ll have to do that yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: Item on item
item.dc:creator: @xweetok599 xweetok599
item.description:
@xweetok599 wrote:

No, LIKE when u want to make cake, you use like an egg on the cake tin, but if u got milk and a pot of flour in your inventory, noy only the egg goes away, but the egg, milk and pot of flour goes away and the cake tin changes in to an uncooked cake. But when u use an egg on a cake tin, but don’t have a bucket of milk and a pot of flour, a message will be send: (i mean that sendMessage command, so that u see the message in the chat box) You don’t have the required items.

Read full topic
